line_1: From Guilt, as at there Infancy,
line_2: And that her Neices were as free
Stay'd by Faith, and led by Thee!

line_1: To press the velvet lip of infancy;
line_2: That love matur'd, next playful on the knee
An emblem, viewed with kindred eye,

line_1: Attended on him, in his Infancy;
line_2: And with a grateful Heart, in Person She
